snippet: This week’s houses include a four-bedroom in Stamford, Conn., and a five-bedroom in Syosset, N.Y.

byline.contributor: Additional reporting by Elsa Brenner, Marcelle Sussman Fischler and Suzanne Hamlin.

lead_paragraph: This week’s houses include a four-bedroom in Stamford, Conn., and a five-bedroom in Syosset, N.Y.

headline.main: Homes for Sale in Connecticut and New York
headline.kicker: On the Market in the New York Region
